predicate.note: Frames file for 'mobilize' based on sentence in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. No comparison.

roleset.name: cause to be in motion, summon to arms

example.name: only example so far
example.text: So far, Wall Street's Old Guard seems to be winning the program-trading battle, *trace* successfully mobilizing public and congressional opinion to bludgeon their tormentors.
